Literature.Title: Fatty Acid Modification of the Anticancer Peptide LVTX-9 to Enhance Its Cytotoxicity against Malignant Melanoma Cells
Literature.Author: Li F, Wu S, Chen N, Zhu J, Zhao X, Zhang P, Zeng Y, Liu Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mouse skin melanoma B16-F10(IC50=76.3±12.7µM),Mouse skin melanoma B16-F10(IC50=59.2±19.8µM),Mouse fibrosarcoma L929(IC50=>100µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=51.7±4.3µM),Mouse breast cancer 4T1(IC50=>100µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=>100µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=>100µM)
